tinyvm.rcx
Class Motor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--tinyvm.rcx.Motor
public class Motor
extends Object

Abstraction for a motor. Example:

   Motor.A.setPower(1);
   Motor.C.setPower(7);
   Motor.A.forward();
   Motor.C.forward();
   for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) { }
   Motor.A.stop();
   Motor.C.stop();

controlMotor

public static void controlMotor(char aMotor,
                                int aMode,
                                int aPower)
Low-level API for controlling a motor.
Parameters:
aMotor - The motor id: 'A', 'B' or 'C'.
aMode - 1=forward, 2=backward, 3=stop, 4=float
aPower - A value in the range [0-7].
